title: Golden oldies
creator_contributor_role: New Zealand National Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aging

description: There are 80-year-olds who still jog, play golf, paint the roof of their house, work their farms and generally enjoy the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A positive look at 'old age' in the golden time of life.
